modName: Akasha -Queen of the Damned- Vampire Companion
summary: This is a tribute to the beautiful late actress and singer Aaliyah Houghton. I am a big fan of her character Akasha from the movie \"The Queen of the Damned\" and wanted her as a companion in my game. She is available as a Calculated Level 40 or Auto-Level character. I think I came pretty close given the various mods and Vanilla parts I had to use.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1340742299.jpg [/img][/center]
[center][img] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1340841170.jpg [/img][/center]

[b][color= cornflowerblue][size= 3] Edit: She is located in Markarth, at The Silverblood Inn, NOT The Old Hroldan Inn. My apologies on the confusion. I had too many mods in the works at the time![/size][/color][/b]

[b]Game Race: Imperial Vampire
Hair: Black
Eyes: Bright Green
Skin Tone: Custom based on photographs of Aaliyah as herself and Akasha. She will be darker or lighter depending on the game lighting and your lighting mods. I posted screenies that show the variations. 
Scaled Weight: 05 for main version (more realistic weight) 50% weight alternate version for ADEC,  CBBE and UNPB BBP users. 
Height: 5\'5\" to 5\"7\"
Location: Silverblood Inn in Markarth. 
Inventory: enchanted Ebony dagger
Voice: Female Sultry
Eye Makeup: My custom Tint-Mask replaces Female Warpaint number 8. It is properly routed for NMM install. 

Required Files: ApachiiSkyHair Version 1.4

Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images
Natural Eyes by nevenbridge: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589
I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and (No Shine some pics) on her.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Pretty Lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body \"Muscle Patch v2\" textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer as long as you use the body option that is correct for the mod you are using) (GlossTech V5 \"No Shine\" used in some pics)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666


She is wearing:
Elements of Gatti 12 Jewelry Outfit for CBBEv3 by Gatti: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18452
Playable Crown of Barenziah by Ares1: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11945
Neo Slave Leia for Skyrim - CBBE by Neovinci aka Meister  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13052,
(She will appear nude in your game!)

***ApachiiSkyHair 1.4 is REQUIRED!***

Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b]
author: FalmerBane

files.name: Akasha Auto-Level from 10 to 100 Heavier Weight
